price: Kandi uburanga bwose (ku munsi w’imperuka) buzaba bwaciye bugufi imbere ya (Allah), Uhoraho akanabeshaho ibiriho byose. Kandi inkozi z’ibibi zizaba ziri mu kaga.
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
